strings.evolution:
You are great!
But Gau is greater!
strings.affinity:
Gau's treasure is sparkly.
I give it to you!
Treasure! My treasure!
strings.description: A feral child from another world where magic and espers once lived. Gau joined Sabin and Cyan's journey to repay them for the dried meat he had received from them, and ultimately became a permanent member of their group. He decided to return to the Veldt after Kefka's destruction of the world in order to train for the day in which he would have to fight alongside his friends once again. Although Sabin manages to schedule a reunion between Gau and his estranged father later on, the man does not recognize the feral boy and his own child. Despite the results being far from ideal, Gau was content with the fact that his father was still alive nevertheless.
strings.summon:
Gau! Gau, Gau! I'm Gau!
You're my friend! Friend!
Let's journey together!

strings.evolution:
Gau! Dried meats!
Give me dried meats!
strings.affinity:
Gau's treasure is sparkly.
I give it to you!
Treasure! My treasure!
strings.description: A feral child from another world where magic and espers once lived. Gau joined Sabin and his comrades in their fight against the empire to repay them for the dried meat they had given him. Soon afterwards the party learns that Gau has the superhuman ability to learn attacks used by the monsters of the Veldt--a unique skill said to have been of great help when facing off against the empire.
strings.fusion:
I am Gau,
I do my best!

strings.affinity:
Gau's treasure is sparkly.
I give it to you!
Treasure! My treasure!
strings.description: A feral child from another world where magic and espers once lived. Gau was abandoned by his father as a babe, and consequently grew alongside the beasts of the region known as the Veldt. Although he is not adept with words, he tries to communicate his emotions through gestures and physical motions. Eventually he runs into Sabin and his friends, who are en route to Narshe, and demands food from them. After Sabin gives him dried meat to earn his trust, Gau joins the party to show his gratitude. In turn, this ultimately results in him permanently joining the Returners on their efforts against the empire.
strings.fusion:
I am Gau,
I train in the Cave on the Veldt.
